cast.name: 米歇尔·亚历山大 Michelle Alexander

this_title: Hidden Colors 2: The Triumph of Melanin
introduction: "Hidden Colors 2" is the follow-up to the critically acclaimed 2011 documentary about the untold history of people of African and aboriginal descent. This installment of goes into topics such as the global African presence, the science of melanin, the truth about the prison industrial complex, how thriving Black economic communities were undermined in America, the hidden truth about Native Americans, and much more.
chinese_title: Hidden Colors 2: The Triumph of Melanin
